lead_paragraph: Federal prosecutors in Manhattan and San Francisco are investigating how bank employees secretly opened accounts without customers’ consent.

byline.original: By BEN PROTESS, MATTHEW GOLDSTEIN and MICHAEL CORKERY

headline.print_headline: Wells Fargo  Subpoenaed  in Inquiry of Accounts
headline.main: Wells Fargo Subpoenaed in Sham Account Case

snippet: Federal prosecutors in Manhattan and San Francisco are investigating how bank employees secretly opened accounts without customers’ consent....
abstract: Wells Fargo is subpoenaed by three United States attorneys' offices, intensifying probe into how thousands of bank employees secretly issued over one million sham accounts without customers' consent.
